column5: Kind of Reminiscing our Teenage years as my wife celebrates her 50th Birthday, I thought about our Dates and Songs we used to Listen too.  One of our Favorites was Mexican and Wells Fargo by Babe Ruth.  I bought the album First Base and Loved it as soon as I put her on the Phonograph. Jenny Haan has a fantastic voice, but never knew her to actually to be a good performer.  Anyways I found this video (Poor) and I thought, does anybody remember these guys as they are really talented but never gained popularity.
